title: Michelin to debut Power 6, Power GP 2, Anakee Road motorcycle tires in 2024 - RubberNews.com
summary: Michelin is introducing three new motorcycle tires: the Power 6, Power GP 2, and Anakee Road. These tires are designed to optimize performance and longevity, offering riders the ride and handling they expect. Michelin has worked closely with motorcycle manufacturers to ensure these tires meet the specificities of new motorcycle models.
product_or_process: Michelin Power 6, Michelin Power GP 2, Michelin Anakee Road

greenwashing: There is no evidence of greenwashing in the article, as it doesn't claim any environmental benefits for the new tires.
